head.supplied: 26/9/76. ¶ ¶ Submitted for favorable consideration of the hon. the Chief Secretary. ¶ Ferd. von Mueller ¶ VICTORIA. ¶ REQUISITION FOR ¶ Books...

div.p: K76/10617, unit 881, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
26/9/76.
The date given by M precedes that of the formal request from the Patent Office, also included in the file, for copies of his works. See J. Hicks to M, 27 September 1876.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Submitted for favorable consideration of the hon. the Chief Secretary.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p:
REQUISITION FOR Books
Building materials deleted, replaced with Books.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
